text: KIH37 (sometimes referred to as South Coast All Hazards) is a NOAA Weather Radio station that serves the area of Brookings, Oregon and surrounding cities. It is programmed from the National Weather Service forecast office in Medford, Oregon with its transmitter located along Gardner Ridge Road, in rural Curry County. It broadcasts weather and hazard information for the following counties in Oregon: Curry, and in the following counties in California: Del Norte. ==References== IH37 Category:Brookings, Oregon
title: KIH37
